item.title: R package postr: created posters with R markdown
item.description: This is a preliminary version of the introduction to postr. Please go to my Github repo postr for the latest updates. HUGOMORE42 This package is modified from kuleuven-template, where you can see the requirements before using this package. Here I picked out the instruction for Windows users as follows. Install a LaTeX distribution, e.g.Â MiKTeX. For Chinese users CTeX is highly recommended. Install Texmaker Install R Install RStudio Install Python 2 Install Python filter support for Pandoc: on a Windows command prompt, type pip install pandocfilters Install SumatraPDF for auto-refresh of PDF previews Afterwards, add the Python directory to the system PATH variable.
